column4: Second Nature imagines a future where human trash becomes the base of new life. After thousands of years, plastics, metals, and wires come together to form a new planet.
(Un)Faced is a scrolling story about identity and conformity in a future ruled by masks. When your mask falls and reveals a void, your journey to rediscover the self begins.

Dear Dream Self is a game inspired by makeup games, where players use familiar beauty tools to gradually edit their faces as the reflection becomes more distorted and unsettling. It carries a message to the future: love and protect your original self in a world where endless comparison and beauty standards can become a trap.
Have you ever wondered how the previous generations of humans interacted with the web? A thousand years ago, the interface was merely a simple code.
This work imagines the world thousands years later, when synethesia is common: how will people express and perceive their emotion? Maybe not through words anymore...
A voyager floating in the space.
Long-lost friends + donuts = a reunion full of surprises! Play this interactive story game to help prepare for the gathering and solve fun puzzles along the way!

A Life is a project for a viewer 1000 years in the future. It serves as a message to take a break and reflect on what it means to do things for yourself, and thus fight against alienation of your work/life.
An interactive net art story to the future on the dangers of illegal mining. The story talks about two cities and how they dealt with illegal mining.
